welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Merrifield, a charming city known for its friendly locals and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore our charming streets, immerse yourself in our culture, and enjoy all that Merrifield has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the primary hub for all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport primarily serves American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves a variety of airlines including Delta, JetBlue, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Terminal D at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the newest terminal and serves mainly United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'DCA Free WiFi' on their device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport is a small and modern facility, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport offers exclusive services and amenities for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and car rental services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for its passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport caters specifically to military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
